imdb.title: Ai Tenchi Muyo!
imdb.plot: A reboot of the Tench Muyo anime In TV short form. The Series takes place in the city of Takahashi, the real-life sponsor of the show.

episodes.title: Tenchi's Journey Begins
episodes.plot: Washu sends Tenchi back in time to help a lost young girl, setting a wild chain of events in motion.

episodes.title: Underground Unrest
episodes.plot: After a narrow escape, Tenchi learns that the rivalry between the Student Council and the Science Club runs deep. All the way underground, in fact.

episodes.title: Survived the First Day
episodes.plot: Back home at last, Tenchi has a chance to decompress -- mostly -- with Sasami, Aeka and Ryoko.

episodes.title: Tenchi Encounter
episodes.plot: In the past, Tenchi and young Momo run into some familiar-looking locals, plus one very out-of-place space pirate.

episodes.title: Festival Preparation
episodes.plot: Ms. Kurihara sees potential in Tenchi, but the young assistant teacher has to intervene in a squabble over the Science Club's budgetary woes.

episodes.title: Friend and Foe Stuck in the Same Boat
episodes.plot: Hachiko and Kinojo may be strong, but they're not the best pair to be stuck in a labyrinth with.

episodes.title: Delicious Trouble
episodes.plot: Looks like the school is getting a new transfer student. Meanwhile, Ryoko puts on a masterclass in cooking.

episodes.title: Tenchi Arrives
episodes.plot: That's "Mr. Tenchi" to you! Our ponytailed hero braves treacherous nature and bewildering encounters en route to his new gig: assistant teacher at an all-girls' high school.

episodes.title: Tenchi's Kiss
episodes.plot: A massive flare-up of egos lands Tenchi in an unexpected, major role in Hachiko's play.

episodes.title: Storm Before Interlude
episodes.plot: After things wind down, Saryu comes by with an unusual request. The school's factions prepare for a new challenge.

episodes.title: Obstacle Course
episodes.plot: Goriki makes an appearance, throwing the first challenge into disarray. But the Student Council still has teamwork on their side.

episodes.title: Hazy Shadows
episodes.plot: Washu and the Science Club stand tall against the attackers. Momo and Kinojo finally find an answer they've both been seeking.

episodes.title: Meeting on the Roof
episodes.plot: Kinojo and Tenchi have a frank and fraught heart-to-heart. Count on Momo to step in and save the day... Or to try, anyway.

episodes.title: Make a Choice
episodes.plot: Tenchi, Momo and the Science Club uncover a key to everything happening at the school, but getting it won't be easy.

episodes.title: Bringing about the Storm
episodes.plot: As Tenchi and the others regroup with the Student Council, the Science Club finds a new mission. Ms. Kurihara intercepts a telling communication.

episodes.title: Declaration of War
episodes.plot: Galactic forces have their eye on what's happening on Earth. As for the Student Council and the Science Club, all's fair in love and elections.

episodes.title: A Case of Corruption
episodes.plot: Ethics go out the window as the Science Club campaign makes the most of its guile and technology.

episodes.title: Scandal Coverage
episodes.plot: Even in the face of disastrous consequences, Momo refuses to run or hide. In a rooftop heart-to-heart, she tells Tenchi what drives her.

episodes.title: Torn Asunder
episodes.plot: Tenchi continues to chase after shadows, while Washu and her very reluctant adversaries strive for a deal.

episodes.title: One and Only
episodes.plot: Tenchi's dimensional dance winds down. The path to fixing what's been broken is clear, but it demands one brave sacrifice.

episodes.title: Once in a Lifetime Encounter
episodes.plot: For Tenchi and his friends, even the students of Junai, some things never really change, even when everything does.
